nutlet.advancement.root_description: Please install "Better Advancements" mod first to improve the advancement UI.
nutlet.advancement.recipe.title: Don't Type Space!
nutlet.advancement.usage.title: What Usage of Spell Book?
nutlet.advancement.usage.description: To cast spells, you need to write specific content on the first page of the book. Hold the book and press %s key to activate the spell that matches the written content.
nutlet.advancement.spells.title: All Spells
nutlet.advancement.spells.description: The titles of advancement following this advancement are all text content required for casting spells.
nutlet.advancement.put_helmet.descriptio: Write the text "Put Helmet" on the first page of the spell book. Hold the book and prees %s key to a block to wear item on your offhand to your head.
nutlet.advancement.show_arms.description: %s a %s to make it grow arms.
nutlet.advancement.transparent.descripti: %s a block attached with an %s to make it Transparent.
nutlet.advancement.config.description:
Page 2: Enter a configuration name to view details or modify it. Leave blank to view all configurations.
Page 3: Enter the new value for the configuration from Page 2. Leave blank to view the default value.
nutlet.item.spell_book.name: Spell Book
nutlet.info.no_spell: It seems your spell has no effect...
nutlet.info.grow_arms_suc: You successfully made it grow arms!
nutlet.info.call_lightning_fail_1: You must hit a %s to call lightning.
nutlet.info.call_lightning_fail_2: You need to throw one %s on the lightning rod.
nutlet.info.put_helmet_fail_1: You need to carry an item in your offhand slot.
nutlet.info.config.wrong_set: Failed to modify the config. Please check if the value format is correct.
nutlet.info.config.get_privilege: As the first player to crafted spell book, you have gained the authority to modify the configuration of this world. Those who crafted spell book afterwards will not obtain this authority.
nutlet.info.config.no_privilege: You have no authority to modify configurations of this world.
